page.title: 20ROLLE COLLEGE, EXMOUTH
page.content: Rolle College was opened in 1946.The numbers of students have increased since it was opened.At first the college only took women.In 1967 it started to take male students.There are 850 students attending the college, 650 are taking Bachelor of Education Degrees and the other 200 are taking Bachelor of Arts Degrees. To become a student at the college a minimum of 2 'A' levels and 4 'O' levels are needed,including Maths and English.The facilities at Rolle include Resource Centres,School Classrooms,Laboratories, Computer Room, Library, Gymnasium, Music Room with a computer that writes music and a synthesiser, college bar and gardens where students can relax. I think Rolle College is very good for students because they have good facilities for work and relaxation.
